meanings.definition: The quality of being amusing or entertaining.
meanings.sent1: Her jokes always bring a sense of amusingnesses to the room.
meanings.sent2: The amusingnesses of the comedy show had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent3: The amusingnesses of the situation made us all chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His storytelling had an amusingnesses that painted vivid pictures in our minds.
meanings.sent5: The amusingnesses of the clown's performance was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Things that cause amusement or laughter.
meanings.sent1: The children's toys were full of amusingnesses.
meanings.sent2: The amusingnesses at the party kept everyone in high spirits.
meanings.sent3: The amusingnesses of the prank caught us all by surprise.
meanings.sent4: The amusingnesses of the situation was like a burst of joy.
meanings.sent5: The amusingnesses of the comedy act lingered in the air.
